tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (PP (IN For) (NP (DT the) (NN record))) (S (VP (VBG spending) (NP (DT the) (NN night)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN ER)) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Son))))))) (VP (VBZ is) (RB not) (NP (ADJP (RB as) (JJ much)) (NN fun)) (SBAR (IN as) (S (NP (PRP it)) (VP (VBZ sounds))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [fun/NN nmod:for>[record/NN case>For/IN det>the/DT] csubj>[spending/VBG nmod:tmod>[night/NN det>the/DT] nmod:in>[ER/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT nmod:with>[Son/NNP case>with/IN nmod:poss>your/PRP$]]] cop>is/VBZ neg>not/RB amod>[much/JJ advmod>as/RB] advcl>[sounds/VBZ mark>as/IN nsubj>it/PRP] punct>./.]
